TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDatabasePatch extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A database resource.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of SqlDatabasePatch.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AutoPauseDelay As Nullable(Of Integer)
member this.AutoPauseDelay : Nullable<int> with get, set

Docs.summary: Time in minutes after which database is automatically paused. A value of -1 means that automatic pause is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CatalogCollation As Nullable(Of CatalogCollationType)

Docs.summary: Collation of the metadata catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Collation : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The collation of the database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CreateMode As Nullable(Of CreateMode)

Docs.summary:
Specifies the mode of database creation.
Default: regular database creation.
Copy: creates a database as a copy of an existing database. sourceDatabaseId must be specified as the resource ID of the source database.
Secondary: creates a database as a secondary replica of an existing database. sourceDatabaseId must be specified as the resource ID of the existing primary database.
PointInTimeRestore: Creates a database by restoring a point in time backup of an existing database. sourceDatabaseId must be specified as the resource ID of the existing database, and restorePointInTime must be specified.
Recovery: Creates a database by restoring a geo-replicated backup. sourceDatabaseId must be specified as the recoverable database resource ID to restore.
Restore: Creates a database by restoring a backup of a deleted database. sourceDatabaseId must be specified. If sourceDatabaseId is the database's original resource ID, then sourceDatabaseDeletionDate must be specified. Otherwise sourceDatabaseId must be the restorable dropped database resource ID and sourceDatabaseDeletionDate is ignored. restorePointInTime may also be specified to restore from an earlier point in time.
RestoreLongTermRetentionBackup: Creates a database by restoring from a long term retention vault. recoveryServicesRecoveryPointResourceId must be specified as the recovery point resource ID.
Copy, Secondary, and RestoreLongTermRetentionBackup are not supported for DataWarehouse edition.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CreationOn As Nullable(Of DateTimeOffset)

Docs.summary: The creation date of the database (ISO8601 format).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentBackupStorageRedundancy As Nullable(Of CurrentBackupStorageRedundancy)

Docs.summary: This records the earliest start date and time that restore is available for this database (ISO8601 format).

Docs.summary: The resource identifier of the elastic pool containing this database.

member this.HighAvailabilityReplicaCount : Nullable<int> with get, set

Docs.summary: The number of secondary replicas associated with the database that are used to provide high availability.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInfraEncryptionEnabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: Infra encryption is enabled for this database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsLedgerOn As Nullable(Of Boolean)
member this.IsLedgerOn : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Whether or not this database is a ledger database, which means all tables in the database are ledger tables. Note: the value of this property cannot be changed after the database has been created.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property LicenseType As Nullable(Of DatabaseLicenseType)

Docs.summary: The license type to apply for this database. `LicenseIncluded` if you need a license, or `BasePrice` if you have a license and are eligible for the Azure Hybrid Benefit.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.LongTermRetentionBackupResourceId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The resource identifier of the long term retention backup associated with create operation of this database.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaintenanceConfigurationId : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Maintenance configuration id assigned to the database. This configuration defines the period when the maintenance updates will occur.

member this.MaxSizeBytes : Nullable<int64> with get, set

member this.MinCapacity : Nullable<double> with get, set

Docs.summary: Minimal capacity that database will always have allocated, if not paused.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PausedOn As Nullable(Of DateTimeOffset)

Docs.summary: The date when database was paused by user configuration or action(ISO8601 format). Null if the database is ready.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ReadScale As Nullable(Of DatabaseReadScale)

Docs.summary: The state of read-only routing. If enabled, connections that have application intent set to readonly in their connection string may be routed to a readonly secondary replica in the same region.
